amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Correctional Services-made goods; Department of Health and Human Services and Department of Correctional Services; administrative powers.
amendatorysection.para: The Department of Health and Human Services and the Department of Correctional Services shall administer the provisions of sections 83-144 to 83-152.

crossreference.para: Provisions relating to materiel division not applicable to purchase or use of prison-made goods, see section 81-146.
